title: Timed Out
description: Jane Lambert thinks she may have made a mistake putting her work ahead of love and family for so long. She’s left wondering what to do with her life now that she has retired.Taking note of the sentiment from one of her retirement cards -Retirement is NOT the end. It’s a NEW BEGINNING - she decides it’s about time she looked for love again, and places a lonely hearts advertisement. Jane embarks on her new life, suffering disappointments and learning hard truths about herself, while never losing her gift for self mockery or her eye for the absurd.Timed Out is a contemporary “coming-of-age” novel about different kinds of love and the search for a meaningful life.For more information: http://www.drivenpress.net
author: Barbara Lorna Hudson
